nodes.text: Nadia Grell's cousin was a female Sarkhai living on Sarkhai during the Galactic War. She was the niece of Senator Tobas Grell and the cousin of his daughter Nadia Grell.

Nadia Grell's cousin is mentioned in Star Wars: The Old Republic only if Jedi Consular is a male who pursues romance and marries Nadia Grell. If that happens, Nadia received a wedding gift from her cousin.[source?]
